entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 2:43PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Very Cold Air Expected Late Tonight Into Saturday Morning Across Northern Alabama and Southern Middle Tennessee... An arctic front is expected to move south through the area late this evening. Behind this front, very cold air is expected to move into northern Alabama and southern middle Tennessee. Temperatures will fall off into the mid teens to lower 20s late tonight.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 1:16PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: Winds are expected to increase this evening and continue into Saturday morning. The peak window for the strongest winds will be between 11 PM this evening through 5 AM MST Saturday. Expect Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts approaching 60 mph. Travelers in high profile vehicles and tractor trailers along I-80 between Elk Mountain and Arlington should use extra caution.
